paper_abstract: Dynamic Description Logic (DDL) can support both the static and dynamic knowledge representation, thus this paper introduces a kind of Software Architecture (SA) Model based on DDL, the purpose of which is to facilitate the description of each part of SA as well as the constraints between them. In addition, the model also supports the detection of the consistency problems existed in dynamic architecture. In the end, the mapping from SA to DLL is discussed, and an example of a complete architecture model of Pipeline-Filter style is described.
